title: Powering Sri Lanka’s #1 Banking App
description: Arimac transformed the People’s Bank app into Sri Lanka’s most downloaded banking app with over 2 million downloads and 100Mn+ transactions. Through smart UX, LankaQR integration, and user-first innovation, we tripled the user base in just 12 months.

title: AIA Insurance Customer Experience Suite
description: AIA’s Customer Experience Suite changes how millions manage life, health, and retirement services. Using Adobe technology, it offers an easy-to-use portal that focuses on innovation and personalization, helping people live healthier and better lives.

title: Qatar Pay Later (PayLater)
description: We built a simple, Shari’a-compliant payment system that lets people split their purchases into easy, interest-free installments. It works online and in stores, helping customers buy with ease and helping businesses grow.

title: Visa USA: Real Solutions. Global Scale
description: Visa USA is at the heart of our digital payment innovations. From immersive e-commerce UX to streamlined payment panels, our Visa-powered solutions help organizations like Oxfam and SAIV scale smarter

title: One App. Endless Possibilities.
description: The Softlogic Super App brings together shopping, healthcare, finance, and more — all in one seamless experience. Discover exclusive deals, make secure payments, and access everything Softlogic with just a tap.

title: Cashew Payment
description: Cashew Payments is a next-gen fintech platform built to make your transactions smoother, faster, and smarter. Whether you're a business or an individual, we give you the tools to manage payments effortlessly; all in one place.

title: Riyad Bank Digital Innovation Center
description: Our solution for Riyad Bank’s Digital Innovation Center blends immersive technology, user-centric design, and interactive experiences to showcase the future of banking — smarter, seamless, and engaging.

title: Next-Gen Investment Experience
description: Asia Securities redefined its digital presence through a secure, intelligent platform enabling faster insights and investor engagement.

title: Friendipay
description: Friendipay is a digital wallet app in Kuwait that lets users pay, send money, and manage finances securely from their phones. We built a user-friendly platform with features like bill payments, mobile top-ups, QR payments, and easy eKYC onboarding. With support for multiple languages and local merchants, Friendipay makes everyday spending simple.
